description.p: mservdetect is a small helper application for masqmail to detect its online status if the modem server masqdialer is used. It connects to the host at port and prints the connection name to stdout.
If you want to use it, set online_detect=pipe and online_pipe="/usr/bin/mservdetect host port".

optdesc.p: The hostname where the masqdialer server is running.
The port number where the masqdialer server is listening.
